images.prompt: A vibrant nebula with swirling clouds of pink and purple gas, set against a backdrop of deep blues and blacks, with stars and galaxies shining through the haze.

A field of asteroids, ranging in size from small rocks to massive boulders, set against a backdrop of a starry night sky, with a distant planet looming in the distance, its rings glowing with a soft, ethereal light.

response.description: Two breathtaking images of space, showcasing the beauty and wonder of the cosmos.
